/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of the city's towering structures. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a stark contrast to the urban landscape below. Buildings of various sizes and shapes fill the background, their facades adorned with scaffolding and cranes, indicating a city in the throes of development. The street itself is lined with trees and lampposts, adding a touch of greenery to the concrete jungle. Cars and buses can be seen in motion on the road, adding a dynamic element to the scene. The image is bathed in the light of a sunny day, casting long shadows and highlighting the architectural details of the buildings.
